segments.text: My mind races through all the potential accidents here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most immediate danger is that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall, I'm absolutely sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could seriously hurt himself, or smash those plates he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then there's the ever-growing puddle of water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s an absolute mess, and it’s spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could slip and fall, including the unaware woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water damage to those nice cabinets and the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s just a terrible waste of water, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel quite uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning all that up later is unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would intervene before something truly bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a preventable series of unfortunate events.
segments.speaker: PAR
